msContents.summary: Hagadah for Passover according to the Spanish rite (the 'Hispano-Moresque Hagadah').

msItem.title: הגדה של פסח Hagadah shel Pesaḥ

collation.p: 13 quires: i4 (folios 1-3*), ii8 (folios 4-11), iii8 (folios 12-19), iv6 (folios 20-25), v8 (folios 26-33), vi8 (folios 34-41), vii8 (folios 42-49), viii8 (folios 50-57), ix6 (folios 58-63), x6 (folios 64-69), xi8 (folios 70-77), xii8-1 (folios 78-84), xiii10-1 (folios 85-93).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sephardi square script, punctuated, of the last quarter of the 13th century or 1st quarter of the 14th century, c. 1300.

decoDesc.decoNote: Picture cycle of 63 full-page miniatures with coloured washes.
1r2 full-page miniatures at the beginning and at the end of the text of the Haggadah.
35v2 full-page miniatures at the beginning and at the end of the text of the Haggadah.
Numerous decorated initial-word panels with gold letters.
18vEmbellished vertical band with keywords of texts on two folios.
19rEmbellished vertical band with keywords of texts on two folios.

binding.p: Post-1600. Black leather. Spine: 'Haggada. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2737.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Hayim Horowitz: purchased by the British Museum from him on 26 January 1884 (paper flyleaf of the back binding).
